channel.title: Mods please move to other games section (a fun game to play, with pics)
channel.description:
hey, this isn't advertising (hopefully, im not really sure if it is) but its just a fun game i recomend playing
diablo2 (its like 8 years old, but rocks, if u think the game looks lame then just don't post) [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/8721/itscalledpawnageax2.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-04
thats me with some skeletons and a blood golem i raised
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/6266/d2charsih4.png[/img][/URL] Shot at 2007-08-04
thats, idk which one it is but its a pic (ill ad more later its just taking a long time)
